description: Project management in high-tech electrical & information technology engineering laboratories, where dealing with risk & fast changing technologies are special factors. Good working knowledge of project management for the early career engineer. Development of interpersonal skills for team management.
incompatible: CSSE3004 or CSSE3005 or CSSE7024 or CSSE7025 or ENGG7800 or METR4910 or MCH3600
restricted: Third or Fourth year students only
